attributes.description: Top Speed Motors is an award-winning used vehicle dealership in the Vaal area, with branches in Vereeniging as well as Vanderbijlpark. Top Speed Motors is AA Dekra affiliated as well as RMI and MIWA Approved and also accredited at all major banks, Wesbank, Absa, Standard Bank, MFC and IEMAS to accommodate you with all your financial needs. Top Speed Motors delivers country wide!! Also, visit our Facebook page for daily and weekly specials and competitions. Terms and conditions apply.
attributes.title: 1994 Volkswagen Beetle Beach Buggy

attributes.description: Excellent Condition Nissan Juke, Full service record with sparekey available.  BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our Valued customers. As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully fledged automotive dealer group offers New cars, Used Cars, Parts and service to all existing and potential customers. With us you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership. To find out more about this vehicle, contact the dealer now.
